text: We are sorry about the #powercut in #Newport #NP20 and surrounding areas.  Engineers are working to have all properties back on by 02:00.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #ST17 #Stafford area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Apologies for the #powercut in #ST17 #Stafford & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 15:00.  Siân.
We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #TA24 # Minehead area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut  Siân
Update #powercut #Minehead #TA24 & surrounding areas. We're sorry for the delay in restoring power, our engineers are working to have all properties back on by 10:00. Geraint
Apologies for the #powercut in #Minehead #TA24 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 05:30. Geraint
We are aware that properties are without power in #Truro #TR2 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 15:30. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
We are aware that properties are without power in #Truro #TR2 & surrounding area. We aim to restore all supplies by 14:00. Apologies to all affected by the #powercut
Apologies for the #powercut in #Southam #CV47 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 07:00. Geraint
Update #Powercut we've got the majority of supplies back on in #MiltonKeynes #MK19 but are working hard to restore the remaining properties by approximately time. Apologies for the delay. Ellie
Apologies for the #powercut in #MiltonKeynes MK19 to restore all supplies by 18:00. Ellie
Apologies for the #powercut in #KirkbyInAshfield #NG17 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 07:30. Geraint

Apologies for the #powercut in #Portishead #BS20 & surrounding areas. Our engineers are working on the issue and aim to restore all supplies by 02:30. Geraint
All supplies to # Bristol #BS1 #BS2 have now been restored. Apologies to all customers affected by the #powercut  Siân

We're pleased to say that all power supplies to #Bristol #BS3 #BS4 area are restored. We are sorry for any inconvenience caused by the #powercut.  Siân
